long_description: Featuring urban style and water-repellent down, the women's REI Rimrock Down Jacket wraps you in downy warmth that won't be compromised by soggy weather. Water-repellent 650-fill-power duck down offers all-conditions warmth. Shell is windproof up to 50 mph and has a Durable Water Repellent finish; thigh-length style provides added coverage. Fleece-lined upper body adds a soft touch and an extra layer of insulation; taffeta-lined lower body helps it slide easily on and off over clothing. Warmth-retaining features include inner cuff gaskets, an adjustable hood and an adjustable hem drawcord; 2-way front zip has a stormflap and chin guard. The women's REI Rimrock Down Jacket includes zip handwarmer pockets and an inner zip chest pocket with a cord port.
short_description: Featuring urban style and water-repellent down, the women's REI Rimrock Down Jacket wraps you in downy warmth that won't be compromised by soggy weather.
